component.name: Doudou
component.summary: Privacy-focused music player for personal media server

description.p: Your personal music player that puts privacy first. Stream your music collection from your own media server with a beautiful, modern interface that works on all your devices. No tracking, no ads, no cloud services - just your music.
Doudou works with popular self-hosted media servers:

ul.li: Jellyfin - Full support (recommended)
Plex - Working with limitations
Subsonic - Full SubSonic API compatibility
Local Files - Play music directly from your device without any server
Zero tracking - No data collection, analytics, or ads
Beautiful modern interface that adapts to your device
Gapless playback with smooth crossfades
Drag-and-drop queue management and radio mode
High quality audio - Supports MP3, FLAC, AAC, OGG, M4A, WAV, OPUS, and more
Background playback - Music continues while you use other apps
Offline listening - Download your favorites for offline playback
Album artwork from embedded metadata, local images, or online sources

description.p: Note: This is a preview build (v10.0.0-preview) that has been tested but may contain bugs. Please report any issues on GitLab.
Preview release v10.0.0 - This is a debug build that has been tested but may contain bugs.
Major new features in this release:

ul.li: Local Music Support - Play music directly from local filesystem without a media server (MP3, FLAC, WAV, OGG, M4A, AAC, WMA, OPUS, AIFF, ALAC, APE, WEBM)
Swing Music Server Support - Full support for Swing Music self-hosted servers with JWT authentication
API Key Authentication for Jellyfin (X-Emby-Token) as alternative to username/password
Quick Connect support for Jellyfin - login by entering a code from your server dashboard
Local Playlists - Full playlist support for local music with create, rename, delete, and reorder
Album Art Service - Fetches artwork from embedded metadata, local images, MusicBrainz, and Cover Art Archive
Complete desktop UI redesign with modern liquid glass aesthetic
New DesktopTheme system with frosted glass sidebar and gradient effects
Now Playing album art glow uses dominant color from artwork
Reusable glass components: DesktopGlassContainer, DesktopPlayButton, DesktopProgressSlider
New music card components with hover effects and glow
Fixed download button not responding when tapped
Fixed "Callback invoked after it has been deleted" crash when changing tracks
Fixed track duration timestamps showing incorrect values
Fixed Subsonic track durations and favoriting issues
Fixed local music album art not displaying
Fixed account login failing after API key authentication attempts
